entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 4:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
